messages.message: We are using pretty old `mock` version from pypi instead of `unittest.mock`. Is this due to compatibility issues or are we free to use `unittest.mock` in newer code?
We should probably start using unittest.mock. Are there any major differences between the two?

The ones I noticed were improvements to MagicMock, reset_mock(), and bugfixes for some scenarios. There is also improved support for exception apparently.

https://mock.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html (https://mock.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html)
